summary: Wendy S. Collins was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). The documents provided are payroll and certification reports that list her name, salary, and employment dates. She appears in payroll certifications for April 1978 and August 1978, as well as a certification report for December 1978. The documents do not specify her role within the committee, but her presence on the payroll indicates she was a staff member.
significance: Wendy S. Collins' significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations. While her specific role is not detailed in these documents, her presence on the payroll confirms her involvement in the committee's activities during the period covered by the reports.
